sentences.en: Ascetic monks all have tough wills.
sentences.cn: 苦行僧都有着坚韧的意志.

sentences.en: At times, so tightly did they draw , the mouth became stern and harsh, even ascetic.
sentences.cn: 有时那嘴抿得很紧, 便显得严厉 、 凶狠!甚至带禁欲主义的苛刻.

sentences.en: Fenton was a thin, balding and ascetic man.
sentences.cn: 芬顿身材瘦削, 秃顶,是个清心寡欲的人.

sentences.en: He is ascetic and has a good attitude towards everything.
sentences.cn: 他这个人清心寡欲,心态好得很.

sentences.en: He left the luxuries of the court for the life of an ascetic.
sentences.cn: 他放弃了宫廷的奢华，过起了清贫的生活。

sentences.en: He simply smile and said, " I am indeed an ascetic person. "
sentences.cn: 他只是笑了笑,说道: “ 我是个真正的禁欲主义者. ”

sentences.en: His thin, ascetic face mirrows an intensity of thought.
sentences.cn: 他那苦行僧似的瘦脸反映出他正在冥思苦索.

sentences.en: The ascetic saint and the detached sage fail in this respect to be complete human beings.
sentences.cn: 禁欲主义的圣徒和超然独处的贤哲在这方面算不上完整的人.

sentences.en: The hermit followed an ascetic life - style.
sentences.cn: 这个隐士过的是苦行生活.

sentences.en: The monks lived a very ascetic life.
sentences.cn: 僧侣过着很清苦的生活。

sentences.en: The ordinary Yogi - ascetic has a fantastic ― a fantastically distracting, a fascinating ― life!
sentences.cn: 普通的瑜伽苦行修道者有着一种奇异的, 充满魅惑及引人入胜的人生!

sentences.en: This is achieved by strict celibacy and ascetic practices.
sentences.cn: 这要通过严厉的独身生活和禁欲修行而达到.

sentences.en: Throughout history power has been the vice of the ascetic.
sentences.cn: 从古至今,权力都是苦行者的罪恶嗜好.

sentences.en: Vanamee turned his lean ascetic face toward him, his black eyes fixed attentively.
sentences.cn: 伐那米把一张苦行僧似的消瘦的脸转过来, 一双黑眼睛全神贯注的盯着他望.
